## Repository.deleteManyById() method

Delete a list of document by their IDs (soft)

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteManyById(ids: MongoIdExt[]): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ids | [MongoIdExt](./subito-connector-mongodb.mongoidext.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of doc id |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;


## Remarks

It makes a soft deletion, docs still exist into the db with a field "deletedAt"
